caption.p: The P. mauritianum extract reduces the viral progeny production of the African and Asian ZIKV lineages. ( A) ZIKV-MR766 or ( B) ZIKV-PF13 were incubated with different concentrations of the P. mauritianum extract for 1 h at 37 °C. The Vero cells were infected at a MOI of 1 for 24 h. The release of infectious viral particles was measured by plaque forming assays. The results shown are the means ± SD of three independent experiments. Statistical analyses were performed using a one-way ANOVA and Dunnett’s test for multiple comparisons (** p < 0.01; *** p < 0.001).
